I first decided I would like to have a music career when I was about 14.
And I remember I thought I could probably get a record deal in a year.
It takes a year, it's pretty easy.
And I thought, all I had to do is see my potential.
So, I'll record three songs and I'll send this three-song demo to a label.
I'll send it to every label and one of them will pick me.
That's what I thought in my insane mind when I was 14...
...and I thought that would be a great idea,...
...but I didn't get a record deal until I was 22, so it took a lot longer.
